emotions: A strong urge to make a good impression.
influence_others_by: It influences others by: Making them compete for recognition.
its_value_for: He achieves his goals through others.
more_effective_if: Follow up to the end; show empathy by disagreeing; a more realistic pace will be set for your activities.

The Evaluator takes creative ideas and uses them for practical purposes. It is competitive and uses direct methods to achieve results. However, there are those who consider the Evaluator less aggressive since he usually shows consideration for others. Rather than ordering or commanding, the Evaluator engages people on the job using persuasive methods. You get the cooperation of those around you by explaining the logic of the proposed activities.

The Evaluator is usually able to help others visualize the steps necessary to achieve results. He usually talks about a detailed action plan that he will develop himself to ensure an orderly progression toward results. However, in their eagerness to win, the Evaluator can be impatient when it does not stay at established levels or when a lot of follow-up is required.

The Evaluator has quite analytical thinking and is able to express his criticism in words. His words can be quite hurtful. The Evaluator controls the situation better if he relaxes and slows down his work. An axiom that would be useful to achieve this is: "sometimes you win and sometimes you lose."
